Surgeon Simulator 2013 is a darkly humorous over-the-top operation sim game where players
become Nigel Burke, a would-be surgeon taking life into his own shaky hands, performing life-saving
surgical  maneuvers on passive patients. The original prototype Ã¢â‚¬â€œ developed in just 48 hours at
the 2013 Global Game Jam in  January  Ã¢â‚¬â€œ  challenged players to complete a heart transplant, armed only
with an arsenal of clumsy and  inappropriate  tools and a hand that was diabolically difficult to
control, using a combination of keyboard and mouse actions.  The full Steam version comes with
additional features, operations and environments. From carrying out terrifying transplants in theatre
to surgical procedures in the back of an ambulance, Surgeon Simulator 2013 now takes 
operating to the next level.

Notes:

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the crack from PROPHET dir
4- Go To Hell!

Chooes your language in the game menu. This release
includes all the updates released so far.
